Text: O̩do̩ mebie muda uwe̩ ki fʼuto̩no̩ che.
Alu kʼuto̩no̩ le̩ la ade̩ de̩: e̩ne̩ du ku ma je̩ o̩me̩ kʼi natʼe̩wñ kʼi me̩ ñw ekeji-wñ no̩ ñw u; i ki bi ekeji-wñ kpai o̩maye-wñ o̩me̩ le̩ n, todabu ku ma mʼuto̩no̩ e-Jihofa du kpogo me̩.
I chʼe-ononojo uwe̩ neke biʼu o̩me̩ kʼe̩ gba; e̩wñ-we̩ du ki la dʼugbo o̩maye-we̩ uwe̩ ki tʼo̩ no̩ ñw u.
I muda dukpe̩ kʼe̩nale du ki dʼef ume̩ n (todu Jihofa ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ oj ane̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ ogu-we̩ kʼe̩ ne̩),
e-le̩ kate, ku we̩ ki gbʼomu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbo̩ ogbolo, kʼe̩ fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju uko̩ du kʼu nañwa ñw e̩ eñini-i.

Todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩, alu kʼi katane̩ ñw e̩, oñ uwe̩ ame̩ e̩wñ ñw abo uche̩ichi ichi wewe, uwe̩ muda ame̩ e̩wñ ugbo e-ma tak e̩ dʼe̩wñ hi o̩wo̩ n; uwe̩ anʼo̩da abo uche̩ichi ichi wewe, ma muda anʼo̩da e-we̩ n.

I che̩wñ kʼe̩nale dʼef ume̩, kʼi chʼo̩maye-we̩ʼka kʼi dʼef aku-we̩ʼka oj ane̩-we̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, uwe̩ ki chʼo e̩do̩ kpako n, e̩ ki la fʼo̩wo̩ jugbe ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩nale le̩ n;
uwe̩ ki muda chi o̩wo̩ ñw u ofofo kʼe̩ me̩ e̩wñ ñw owñ ki bʼeku kʼi akʼu jo̩.

E̩ ki nago tode̩gba kʼibe bibi adʼe̩f e̩do̩-we̩ kʼe̩ kakini, O̩do̩ e̩kebie, owñ chʼo̩do̩ uto̩no̩ le̩, me̩rʼo̩wo̩ me̩, tak e̩ che eju bie̩ne̩ efu ñw o̩maye-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩nale, kʼe̩ ma la dʼe̩wñ du ñw u n; kʼi la raku do̩ Jihofa nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, ki mud adure eta ñw e̩.
Uwe̩ ki la ko ñw u ofofo, i ki wʼe̩ ab e̩ du ñw u n; todabu ki chʼutodu e̩wñ-i oñ Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef uko̩lo̩-we̩ du kpai ef e̩wñ du kʼo̩wo̩-we̩ akado.
Todu ame̩nale awe ede̩ oj ane̩ le̩ n; todule̩ nañwa ñw e̩-i kakini, Uwe̩ ki chi o̩wo̩-we̩ ñw o̩maye-we̩ kpai e̩ne̩-we̩ kʼi chʼe̩no̩bata kpai ame̩nale-we̩ oj ane̩ le̩.
I che̩wñ ku ma dʼo̩maye-we̩, kʼi chʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Hibru abe̩k onobule̩ Hibru, ta ñw e̩ la, i arʼe̩ o̩do̩ me̩fa, tak o̩do̩ e̩kebie-wñ uwe̩ atʼo̩ no̩ kʼi ne̩ o̩la-wñ.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi lo ofofo, uwe̩ ki je̩ ñw u lo o̩wo̩ ofo n;
uwe̩ ki mʼame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini, kpai e̩wñ oji ajita ugwo̩ka-we̩ kpai e̩wñ aguo̩ko̩lo̩ e-omi achiwebe̩te̩ma-we̩ ko nyʼo̩la-wñ; alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñw e̩ alu le̩ uwe̩ ki du ñw u.
Uwe̩ ki nadibekado ka kʼuwe̩ chʼadu oj ane̩ Ijipti, taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ gbʼuwe̩ tane̩; todule̩ oñ nañwʼe̩wñ kide̩ ñw e̩ eñini-i.
I la che̩wñ kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, Na-kwo bʼe̩ te̩ n, todabu kʼi afe̩do̩ we̩ kpai abunyi-we̩, todabu ki ara ñw u ugbo we̩,
mak e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki mʼosipia du kʼe̩ dʼu gʼu eti du tunyu oli alugbo̩na, tak i amud adu-we̩ ogbegbele̩. Abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ ache adu-we̩ onobule̩ ge̩.

I ki dabe̩ne̩ kʼofu abʼe̩ eju-we̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ tʼo̩ no̩ kʼi kwo bʼuwe̩ te̩ ofofo n; todu i nʼile ñw e̩ dab one̩ meji ku ma ro̩me̩ uko̩lo̩ ñwu ma gbogbo wʼo̩do̩ me̩fa le̩. Abe̩le̩ taku Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ ade̩nyo̩ ñw e̩ ef e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ ache.

Uwe̩ ki che kʼamo̩mojo̩do̩ du kʼamokuno̩-we̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ e-gini abi o̩ko̩, ku ma fo̩ ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩; e̩ ki nʼo̩mojo̩do̩ o̩kokuno̩-we̩ che uko̩lo̩ du n, e̩ ki la ja edudu o̩mojo̩do̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-we̩ egini n.
Eje̩ uwe̩ kpai abunyi-we̩ aje̩ e-le̩ eju Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ugbo ki Jihofa adu.
I muda che̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩ kʼi achika, abe̩k i chʼafeju, abe̩k o̩lo̩ e̩bie̩ne̩ du dʼo̩la-wñ, uwe̩ ki dʼu kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n.
Uwe̩ ki fʼe-le̩ je̩ ef aku aku-we̩; tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma daji tʼabo kʼo̩la-ma fe̩ aje̩ okujo̩, alu ku ma je̩ egbi kpai abede le̩.
E̩wñ okate de̩, uwe̩ ki la je̩ e̩bie̩-wñ n; uwe̩ ki mʼe-le̩ du dajʼane̩pe̩te̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼomiofo.
